content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. Analyze three examples of the relationship between Romanticism and nationalism before 1850.

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. Analyze three examples of the relationship between Romanticism and nationalism before 1850.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
